original: 已遣人對<color=#fff999>$country1</color>無中生有計謀成功，獲得了<color=#13ccd7>糧草 $num1</color>！與我方友好度略有下降…(<color=#bceea7>無中生有 成功</color>)
text: Someone has been sent to <color=#fff999>$country1</color> to succeed in a strategy, and get <color=#13ccd7>grain $num1</color>! The friendship with us declined slightly...(<color=#bceea7>Success 「Bluff」</color>)
